announcement.p: PHP Development Team is would like to announce the immediate availability of PHP 4.3.8. This release is made in response to several security issues that have been discovered since the 4.3.7 release. All users of PHP are strongly encouraged to upgrade to PHP 4.3.8 as soon as possible.
This release addresses several important security issues.
For a full list of changes in PHP 4.3.8, see the ChangeLog.
